patthana18.26:4.1: Araṇo appaccayo dhammo nasaraṇassa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.26:6.1: Araṇo asaṅkhato dhammo nasaraṇassa naasaṅkhatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.26:8.1: Araṇo sanidassano dhammo naaraṇassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.26:8.2: Araṇo sanidassano dhammo nasaraṇassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.26:9.1: Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate dve.
